card.name: Chaos (B-001)
card.text: Chaos cannot leave the field due to your opponent's Summons or abilities. If Chaos is on the field, Chaos can produce CP of any Element. Remove Chaos from the game: Select 1 of the 2 following actions. "Choose 1 Light Forward. Break it." "Play 1 Card Name Feral Chaos from your hand onto the field."
card.type: Backup - DFF · I - God of Chaos

card.name: Spiritus (B-002)
card.text: Spiritus cannot leave the field due to your opponent's Summons or abilities. You can play 2 or more Dark Characters onto the field. If Spiritus is on the field, Spiritus can produce CP of any Element. You can discard Dark Element cards from your hand to produce CP. (Dark cards produce 2 Dark CP each.)

card.text: Haste If you control 4 or more Backups, Kunshira loses 3000 power. Tempest Spellblade (S)(Wind)(Lightning): Activate Kunshira. Until the end of the turn, all the Forwards opponent controls lose 4000 power and Kunshira gains First Strike and "Kunshira can attack once more this turn."

card.name: Golbez (13-115L)
card.text: [EX BURST] When Golbez enters the field, you may search for 1 card of cost 2 and add it to your hand. Damage 6 -- When Golbez enters the field, you may search for up to 3 cards of cost 2 and add them to your hand. Then, you may play any number of Job Archfiend from your hand onto the field.

card.name: Lightning (13-116C)
card.text: When Lightning enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. "Search for 1 Card Name Odin and add it to your hand." "Lightning gains Haste until the end of the turn."

card.name: Wol (13-117R)
card.text: The Category MOBIUS Forwards other than Wol you control gain +2000 power. When Wol deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 Category MOBIUS Character in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.name: Sarah (MOBIUS) (13-118C)
card.text: When Sarah (MOBIUS) enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. "Choose 1 Forward you control and 1 Forward opponent controls. Each Forward deals damage equal to its power to the other." "Draw 1 card."

card.name: Sophie (13-119L)
card.text: For each Earth Forward other than Sophie you control, Sophie gains +2000 power. For each Water Forward other than Sophie you control, Sophie gains +2000 power. At the end of each of your turns, if Sophie has 10000 power or more, draw 1 card and Sophie deals your opponent 1 point of damage.

card.name: Doga (13-120H)
card.text: For every 3 Summons in your Break Zone, Doga gains +1000 power. When Doga enters the field, draw 1 card for each Summon you discarded to cast Doga. When Doga attacks, if you have 9 or more Summons in your Break Zone, you may cast 1 Summon from your hand without paying the cost.

card.name: Ramza (13-121R)
card.text: If you control 5 or more Category FFT Characters, the cost required to cast Ramza is reduced by 3. When Ramza enters the field, choose 2 Forwards opponent controls. Your opponent puts one of the chosen Forwards into the Break Zone and returns the other to its owner's hand.

card.name: Aldore Emperor (13-122H)
card.text: When Aldore Emperor enters the field, select 1 of the 3 following actions. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, select up to 2 of the 3 following actions instead. "Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage." "Choose 1 Forward of cost 3 or less. Break it." "Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 8000 damage."

card.name: Nine (13-123L)
card.text: You can dull 1 active Fire Job Class Zero Cadet Forward and 1 active Lightning Job Class Zero Cadet Forward (instead of paying the CP cost) to cast Nine. When Nine enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Until the end of the turn, it loses 2000 power for each Job Class Zero Cadet you control.

card.name: Noel (13-124C)
card.text: When Noel enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. "Choose 1 Forward other than Noel you control. Until the end of the turn, it gains +2000 power and Haste." "Choose up to 2 Forwards. Deal them 2000 damage and dull them."

card.name: Yuzuki (13-125R)
card.text: If a Fire Forward you control is dealt damage by your opponent's abilities, the damage becomes 0 instead. If a Water Forward you control is dealt damage, reduce the damage by 2000 instead.

card.name: Ultimecia (13-126C)
card.text: When Ultimecia enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. "Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand." "Choose 1 Character you control. Return it to its owner's hand."

card.name: Chime (13-127H)
card.text: When Chime enters the field, choose 2 Forwards opponent controls. Return the first Forward to its owner's hand, dull and Freeze the other.

card.name: Celestia (13-128L)
card.text: The Water Characters you control cannot be broken by opposing Summons or abilities that don't deal damage. When an Ice Character you control is chosen by your opponent's Summons or abilities, choose up to 1 Character. Dull it and Freeze it.

card.name: Philia (13-129S)
card.text: If Philia is dealt damage by an ability, the damage becomes 0 instead. When Philia enters the field, deal 10000 damage to all the Forwards. Philia deals you 1 point of damage.

card.name: Ran'jit (13-130S)
card.text: The cost required to cast Ran'jit is reduced by 1 for each Backup you control. When Ran'jit enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 8000 damage.

card.name: Emet-Selch (13-131S)
card.text: When Emet-Selch enters the field, you may pay (4). If you do so, search for 1 Ice Backup of cost 4 or less and play it onto the field.

card.name: Titania (13-132S)
card.text: You can only cast Titania if you have a Forward, Backup, Monster and a Summon in your Break Zone (before paying the cost for Titania). When Titania enters the field, choose up to 2 Characters opponent controls. Dull them and Freeze them.

card.name: The Crystal Exarch (13-133S)
card.text: At the beginning of the Attack Phase during each player's turn, choose 1 Forward. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. Damage 5 -- The Crystal Exarch gains "When The Crystal Exarch attacks, choose 1 Forward. If its power is less than The Crystal Exarch's power, break it."
card.type: Forward - XIV - Leader of the Crystarium

card.name: Y'shtola (13-134S)
card.text: Y'shtola cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons. When Y'shtola enters the field, choose 1 Forward in your Break Zone. If its cost is equal to or less than the number of Job Scion of the Seventh Dawn you control, play it onto the field.

card.text: The Job Scion of the Seventh Dawn Forwards you control gain +2000 power. When The Oracle of Light is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may remove The Oracle of Light from the game. When you do so, choose 1 Job Scion of the Seventh Dawn in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field dull.
